name: leotard
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tight piece of clothing that covers the body but not the legs, usually worn by female dancers or women doing physical exercise

a piece of clothing that fits tightly over the body from the shoulders to the tops of the legs, worn esp. by dancers and people exercising
